    An interact strategy that combines two interact strategies.

    class 
    ErrorInteractStrategy
    A strategy for dealing with interact strategy errors.
    class 
    ExplosionStrategy
    A strategy where the ball explodes the ball it is interacting with.
    class 
    GravitationStrategy
    A strategy that pulls a ball towards the current ball.
    class 
    HuntPredatorStrategy
    An type-dependent interaction strategy that the target ball gains mass when it is of type Predator.
    class 
    KillPreyStrategy
    An type-dependent interaction strategy that "kills" the TARGET ball when the target is a PreyBall.
    class 
    RandomizerStrategy
     
    class 
    TeleportStrategy
    A strategy that teleports away a ball that satisfies the criteria.
